title: Storage Account Overview
vision: Azure Storage Account overview page with usage breakdown donut chart (blob/file/table/queue), cost-to-date card with month-over-month trend, and access keys section with copy-to-clipboard and 90-day key age warning.
problem: Storage account admins need a single-glance overview of usage distribution, cost trends, and key rotation status to manage their storage resources effectively.
successCriteria: Donut chart shows blob/file/table/queue usage distribution with legend
Cost card displays current month spend with MoM trend arrow
Access keys section with masked key values and copy buttons
Warning banner when any key is older than 90 days
Full Azure portal chrome (header, side nav, breadcrumb, toolbar)
constraints: Follow existing experiment file structure (data.ts, styles.ts, Navigation.tsx, PageContent.tsx, index.tsx)
Reuse PageHeader and CopilotButton shared patterns
